00063 #define XN_INFINITE   (0)
00064 #define XN_NONBLOCK   ((xnticks_t)-1)

00068 
00069 #define testbits(flags,mask) ((flags) & (mask))
00070 #define setbits(flags,mask)  xnarch_atomic_set_mask(&(flags),mask)
00071 #define clrbits(flags,mask)  xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(&(flags),mask)
00072 #define __testbits(flags,mask) testbits(flags,mask)
00073 #define __setbits(flags,mask)  do { (flags) |= (mask); } while(0)
00074 #define __clrbits(flags,mask)  do { (flags) &= ~(mask); } while(0)
00075 
00076 typedef atomic_flags_t xnflags_t;

00078 #ifndef NULL
00079 #define NULL 0
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 #define XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN 32
00083 
00084 #define xnobject_copy_name(dst, src) \
00085 do { \
00086     if (src) \
00087         strncpy(dst, src, XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN); \
00088     else \
00089         *dst = '\0'; \
00090 } while (0)
00091 
00092 #define xnobject_create_name(dst, n, obj) \
00093     snprintf(dst, n, "%p", obj)
00094 
00095 #define minval(a,b) ((a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))
00096 #define maxval(a,b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))

00112 #define xnpod_fatal(format,args...) \
00113 do { \
00114     const char *panic; \
00115     xnarch_trace_panic_freeze(); \
00116     panic = xnpod_fatal_helper(format,##args); \
00117     xnarch_halt(panic); \
00118 } while (0)

00121 #define SKIN_INIT(name)  __xeno_skin_init(void)
00122 #define SKIN_EXIT(name)  __xeno_skin_exit(void)
00123 #else /* !__XENO_SIM__ */
00124 #define SKIN_INIT(name)  __ ## name ## _skin_init(void)
00125 #define SKIN_EXIT(name)  __ ## name ## _skin_exit(void)
